good quality

mainly the gg team, they are the BEST, but they taking it reeeaaaly sloooow right now at episode 11... I hope we don't have to wait 30  days for an episode till the 25th, then it will last one and a half year to finish the series from now on...
Their subtitles are much coaler than anyone else's. Srsly though - great translating, decent quality imo, nothing to complain about.
successor of [gg] with the same translator and typeset, but with different encoder. encod quality on the [ggrain] level. so, best group to stick with since [gg] dropped series.

Pretty much the same staff as gg.  Still not out-of-this-world great, but qq is probably the best fansub group currently out there in terms of translation quality.  Provides detailed translation notes on the translator's blog.
